*div1 type="summary"* *p*H. H. League to Austin, August 25, 1826. Asking information concerning the government.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Colo. Grosses Mantion house*/location_mentioned* the *date_mentioned n="08-25-1826">25 Aug 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*D sir I left *location_mentioned*town */location_mentioned*without the pleasure of a Parting interview with you. you were not at *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*when I called; on my departure which I the more Regreted because I wished to have Solicited the favour of you to communicate with me at *location_mentioned*Nashville */location_mentioned*concerning the progress of the *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*in general; and also the measures adopted by the Conventional and *person_mentioned*legislative councils*/person_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*State*/location_mentioned*, any communication from you will be most thankfully Received, the health of our *person_mentioned*company */person_mentioned*is increasing*/p*
*p*god grant you many days—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*H. H. League*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
